The show also boosted careers of comics including Billy Crystal , Arsenio Hall and David Letterman . Don Kirshner gave new, young musicians the opportunity to showcase their performances for a huge audience during the` golden age' of the popular music business, Billy Joel said in a statement.`` At the time, his` hands-off' approach to how rock and roll music was presented made television a viable medium for many now-iconic recording artists.'' We once used to think of the establishment as being cabinet ministers, archbishops, BBC panjandrums, leaders of industry and royalty. No longer. It's the links between the government and the Rupert Murdoch empire that count today- a shadowy influence-mart. -- " The Guardian Government of Tunisia shuts down TV channel "`` Tunisia's interim government abruptly shut down the country's oldest and most popular private television network on Sunday

Andy Coulson one degree of separation to the McCann affair: McCann family spokesman Clarence Mitchell joins CCHQ as head of media monitoring for the election www.prweek.com PR Week has the story: The Conservative Party has signed up Clarence Mitchell , best-known as spokesman for Madeleine McCann's parents, as the head of media monitoring for its general election campaign, PRWeek can exclusively reveal.`` Clarence Mitchell joins the Tory comms operation today, reporting directly to director of communications Andy Coulson . Clarence Mitchell , who was the director of the Government's media monitoring unit for two years( 2005-2007) will take a back room role, monitoring the progress of the Tories' campaign in the media. House, Mike Pence said Republicans`` welcome the president's call'' for Social Security reform.`` I think the only danger House Republicans have today is in not being bold enough,'' he said. I think the American people are tired of half-measures. They're looking for men and women at every level of government who are willing to step up and speak the truth and to offer positive solutions to deal with the fiscal crisis that we're facing. That includes domestic spending. That includes reasonable pruning and efficiencies within our defense complex. But it also includes entitlement reform.
